com.google.inject.tools.ideplugin.problem
Class CodeProblem

java.lang.Object
  com.google.inject.tools.ideplugin.problem.CodeProblem
Direct Known Subclasses:
CodeProblem.BindingProblem, CodeProblem.CreationProblem, CodeProblem.InvalidModuleContextProblem
public class CodeProblem
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a problem found involving the user's guice code, such as a CreationException. These are passed to the ProblemsHandler for realtime notification to the user as well as passed along with CodeLocations for display as results.

Author:
Darren Creutz

Nested Class Summary
static class CodeProblem.BindingProblem
          Represents a problem with the binding of the class being injected.
static class CodeProblem.CreationProblem
          Represents a CreationException problem.
static class CodeProblem.InvalidModuleContextProblem
          Represents a problem that the module context is invalid.
static class CodeProblem.NoBindingProblem
          Represents that no binding is defined for the class being injected.
static class CodeProblem.OutOfScopeProblem
          Represents an OutOfScopeException during injection.
